The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon Wednesday to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS: Low humidities, hot temperatures, strong gusty winds,
entry.cap:areaDesc: Big Horn National Forest; Sheridan County, Casper BLM
